results.question: When will my root canal claim of Rs 25,000 be settled?
results.answer: The document does not provide specific information on when a root canal claim of Rs 25,000 will be settled, but generally, claims are settled or rejected within 15 or 45 days from the receipt of the last necessary document, with interest payable for delays beyond 45 days.

results.question: I have done an IVF for Rs 56,000. Is it covered?
results.answer: Error during answer generation: 500 An internal error has occurred. Please retry or report in https://developers.generativeai.google/guide/troubleshooting

results.question: I did a cataract treatment of Rs 100,000. Will you settle the full Rs 100,000?
results.answer: The policy will indemnify medical expenses for cataract treatment up to 25% of the Sum Insured or Rs. 40,000 per eye, whichever is lower, per policy year.

results.question: Give me a list of documents to be uploaded for hospitalization for heart surgery.
results.answer: For a heart surgery hospitalization claim, the required documents include a completed claim form, photo identity proof of the patient, medical practitioner's prescription advising admission, original itemized bills, payment receipts, discharge summary, and investigation/diagnostic test reports supported by the medical practitioner's prescription.
